text: Shared Media: added convenient new feature that allows the creation of folders in the Folder Tab, making it easier to organise and access files & folders.

External Links: enabled private viewing of PDF files on Mobile devices through our Internal Viewer. This ensures your PDFs are secure and protected. Already deployed on Desktop and Web App, making PDF private file viewing now accessible on any device.
Cybersecurity: additional advanced cryptographic protection for Channels, Video conferencing and Invite process.
